wikipedia_page.main: Lee Julian Rogers (born 21 October 1966) is an English former professional footballer who played as a defender in the Football League for Chesterfield, in non-League football for Gainsborough Trinity, and was on the books of Doncaster Rovers without making a league appearance.

link_mentions.page: 1995 Football League Third Division play-off Final

* Lee Rogers (racing driver) (born 1972), British racing driver
* Lee Rogers (novelist), American pseudonym used by Robert "Bob" Rogers
* Lee Rogers (footballer, born 1967), English footballer (Bristol City, Hereford United, York City, Exeter City)
